remark.ch: 人數限制50人，受限於軟體套數

goal.en: The computer-aided engineering is one of the compulsory courses for the undergraduate program in design and analysis. This course covers the theory of finite element modeling and explores its application as a design tool. Students are expected to develop their capabilities to use finite element software to design and analyze mechanical systems throughout this course.
goal.ch: "電腦輔助工程為機械工程系C班設計分析組之大三必修課程，本課程講述有限元素分析相關基礎理論及其應用，主要教學目標在培養學生面對機械系統時，能夠有足夠之知識並能有效的運用電腦，進行設計與分析。學生修畢此課程將能展示以下之能力： 1. 熟悉有限元素法之基本理論。 2. 學習應用電腦輔助工程來分析結構應力、振動、非線性問題。 3. 對最佳化設計方法有初步的認識。 4. 不論繼續深造或進入工業界，都能將大學所學的力學理論應用於解決實際工程的問題。"

content.en:
"Introduction to computer aided engineering
Introduction to finite element method
Structural static analysis
Analysis of link and truss elements
Analysis of beam and frame elements
Analysis of plate and shell elements
Analysis of two-dimensional plane elements
Analysis of three-dimensional solid elements
Structural dynamic analysis
Structural nonlinear static analysis"
content.ch:
"電腦輔助工程概論
有限元素法簡介
結構靜態分析
連桿與桁架元素分析
樑與剛架元素分析
板殼元素分析
二維平面元素分析
三維固體元素分析
結構動態分析
結構非線性靜態分析"

textbook.en: "Chandrupatla & Belegundu, Introduction to Finite Elements in Engineering, 4th Ed., Prentice Hall, 2012."
textbook.ch: "COMSOL Multiphysics 有限元素分析 快易通, 皮托科技股份有限公司"

grading.en: Assignment, attendance & quizzes: 40%; Midterm Exam: 30%; Final Exam: 30%
grading.ch: 40 % homework (不收遲交作業)+ 平時成績 (出席與小考) 30 % Midterm exam (筆考) 30 % Final exam (上機測驗)

en.competency: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation
